title: Zameen.com Property Scraper
description: Scrape property listings from Zameen.com listing pages. Provide one or more listing URLs (area, project, or search pages). The actor paginates and opens detail pages for richer data.

results_wanted.title: Maximum listings
results_wanted.description: Maximum number of listings to collect across all pages.

max_pages.title: Pagination limit
max_pages.description: Safety cap on how many listing pages to open per start URL.

scrapeDetails.title: Open detail pages
scrapeDetails.description: If enabled, actor opens each listing detail page for full data (recommended).

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Use Apify Proxy to reduce blocking. Data center works; residential is optional for heavy runs.
